trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Ottumwa
There was one other sighting in Ottumwa on or around November 1st 2009
divs: Sighting Detailswas looking into the sky while driving on hwy 34 from agency to ottumwa. noticied the bright object in the sky. it then proceeded to hide behind a cloud. when coming off the hwy on exit 191 the object reappeared then just hung there and vanished.
